content: Depends on the Barracks age. Some of the Refurbed have Individual Stalls and the Older ones have Communal with 6 shower heads I've used Dix's Barracks on and off for about 24 years, De-Mobilized twice there, and lived there as an O/C-T for a few weeks at a time The shower entrance in either case faces away from the Latrine entrance doors, so the only way I can think of to get a view would be: 1- Walk onto a female floor and enter the Female latrines (Pretty Ballzy if done). Your caught red handed, though some units have a low fraternization policy, IMO it always leads to trouble. 2- The Frosted Privacy Windows facing the Shower would have to be wide open, and someone across the quadrangle have just the right level for the older Buildings. For the Re-furbished ones the windows are about 2Sq ft all the way up the wall where the Ceiling/Wall meet. If they can prove it the book should be thrown at the Miscreants.
